reasoning: Global incidence of malignant head and neck cancers (all sites combined) from GLOBOCAN 2005: ~6.3 per 100k person-years. Umbrella term encompasses squamous cell carcinoma of oral cavity, pharynx, larynx, and other head/neck sites with varying regional incidence due to HPV, tobacco, and alcohol exposure.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
